item.title: How do you make everywhere pking?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Go to client.JAVA and search:

public boolean nonWild()

And you should see some like this below it:

if((absX >= 3084 && absX <= 3092 && absY >= 3035 && absY <=2932 ) || (absX >= 2924 && absX <= 2972 && absY >=3198 && absY <=3222 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >= 3178 && absX <= 3274 && absY >=3374  && absY <=3510 )||

To delete find something that is close to your choords, highlight and than delete

To add:

absX >= 3084

Is the bottom X

&& absX <= 3092

Is the top right X

&& absY >= 3035

Is the bottom right Y

 && absY <=2932 )

Is the top right Y
